name: Baltic Environmental Forum-Latvia
membership: Our organisations is a part of the Baltic Environmental Forum Group network
goal: general goal of the Association is to promote the significance of environmental protection, by developing co-operation and dialogue between various institutions and stakeholders, and by increasing their capacities in implementation of environmental management.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Environmental Protection and Nature Conservation, Climate change, Regional development, Maritime affairs, Common Agricultural Policy, Circular economy.
